        public Mosaic​(int i,
              int j,
              Figure[] figures)
       throws IllegalMosaicCreationException
        Constructs a mosaic given rows, columns and list of figures
        Parameters:
        i - Rows of the mosaic
        j - Columns of the mosaic
        figures - List of figures to be inserted in the mosaic
        Throws:
        IllegalMosaicCreationException - Controls that there are not more figures than cells in the mosaic

       throws IllegalFigureCreationException
        Clones a mosaic
        Parameters:
        mosaico - Mosaic to be cloned
        Throws:
        IllegalFigureCreationException - Controls the color and the background to be different
